titles.title: A bill for the relief of Willie G. Simpson.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 6/2/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full settlement of all claims against the United States arising from personal property losses due to a fire in a military warehouse in Kentucky in 1977.
